angel_threat.name: Angel Cartel Threat
angel_threat.description: Angel Cartel forces have been spotted near our trade routes. Remove them.
angel_threat.briefing: Angel Cartel has become emboldened. Show them we won't tolerate their presence here.

sansha_incursion.name: Sansha's Nation Scouts
sansha_incursion.description: Sansha's Nation has sent scouts into our territory. Eliminate them before they report back.
sansha_incursion.briefing: Sansha's Nation is probing our defenses. We must respond decisively.

rogue_drone_cleanup.name: Rogue Drone Cleanup
rogue_drone_cleanup.description: Rogue drones have infested a nearby sector. Clear them out.
rogue_drone_cleanup.briefing: These rogue drones are a menace to navigation. Exterminate them all.

destroyer_patrol.name: Destroyer Patrol
destroyer_patrol.description: Enemy destroyers have been detected. We need a skilled pilot to eliminate them.
destroyer_patrol.briefing: These destroyer-class vessels pose a significant threat. Engage with caution.

cruiser_showdown.name: Cruiser Showdown
cruiser_showdown.description: High-threat cruiser-class targets detected. Only experienced pilots should accept this mission.
cruiser_showdown.briefing: These cruisers are commanded by veteran pirates. You'll need a well-fitted ship to succeed.

exploration_site.name: Exploration Site
exploration_site.description: We've located an ancient site. Scan the area and retrieve any valuable artifacts.
exploration_site.briefing: These archaeological sites often contain valuable technology. Be thorough in your scan.

supply_run.name: Emergency Supply Run
supply_run.description: Our outpost needs emergency supplies. Deliver these materials quickly.
supply_run.briefing: Time is of the essence. These supplies are urgently needed at our Hek station.

rare_ore_collection.name: Rare Ore Collection
rare_ore_collection.description: We need rare ores for a special project. Mine the specified ore from the designated asteroid belt.
rare_ore_collection.briefing: These ores are essential for our new manufacturing process. Mine carefully.

faction_warfare.name: Faction Warfare Sortie
faction_warfare.description: A major pirate operation is underway. We need all available pilots to engage.
faction_warfare.briefing: This is a coordinated strike. Expect heavy resistance from multiple factions.

drone_hive_assault.name: Drone Hive Assault
drone_hive_assault.description: A rogue drone hive has been discovered. Destroy the Mother drone to collapse the hive.
drone_hive_assault.briefing: The Mother drone coordinates the entire hive. Once destroyed, the others should scatter.
